figure_1.title: Figure 1.
figure_1.caption: Comparison of stress-strain curves of materials common in spinal reconstruction.

claims.sentence:
Due to the uniform shape, the deformation will be ideally uniform, and as such, the variables that need to be tested can be measured (18).Results
Stress versus strain curves were plotted for each material tested (Figure 1).
The elastic modulus was calculated from the slope of the load-displacement curves (Figure 2).
